creator: M Alam It Service
descriptionHtml:
"All Bangla Newspaper" is the first & only app for the most popular Bangla Newspapers! (Read all Bangla Newspapers online or offline within one app! FREE!)

Keep updated with the latest local, national, and international news published from Bangladesh.

All Bangla Newspaper Lite is a must-have app for every Bangladeshi!

Read directly in the app: Daily Prothom alo, Bangladesh Pratidin, Ittefaq, Daily kaler kantho, Daily Naya Diganta, Daily Amar Sangbad, Protidiner Sangbad, Jugantor, Daily Sangram, Daily Manab Zamin, Dainik Amadershomoy, Samakal, Janakantha, Jai Jai Din, Daily Bhorer Kagoj, Arthoniteer Kagoj, Daily Inqilab, Sangbad, Manob Kantha, Daily Suprobhat, Bangladesh Journal, Bonik Barta, Daily Dinkal, Alokito Bangladesh, Ajker Bazar, Amadar Orthoneeti, Bangladesh Post, Sorejomin Barta, Ajker Patrika, Khabar Patra, Vorer Pata, Shomoyer Alo, Dhakar Dak, Natun Barta, Share biz, Daily Bartoman, Ajkaler Khobor, Sangbad Konika, Somoyer Kantha, Daily Star, Khola Kagoj, Desh Rupantor, Bangladesher Khabor, Amar Desh, Daily Jagran, Business Standard and Dhaka Tribune. (Will be added more).

Main Features:

★ A beautiful design! Clean, fast and easy to use!
★ Most interesting news updates from the best Bangla newspapers!
★ Uses less data! Saves your time and makes your life easier!
★ Offline reading! Read full news without internet connection! (OMG!)
★ Rich news list! Headlines with summaries! Read just in a minute by scrolling!
★ Save news as favorite to read it later or for future reference!
★ Auto synchronization! Always have the latest news on your device!
★ Notification! Keep informed of the latest news for free!
★ Change view! Grid, Title, List, Card List or Card Magazine and more!
★ Sort by Newest, Oldest, Read, Unread, Download Date or Title!
★ Search within the app! Search for newspaper/articles!
★ Share news/articles via Email, Facebook, Twitter, What's App, etc.!
★ Tablet-Optimized! Read your news more comfortable on a tablet!
★ 2 Themes! Easy settings for customization, and much more!

Special Features:

★ Read News when your internet connection turn off.

Like on Facebook and stay informed of the latest app news, updates and features: https://facebook.com/MAlamItServices
descriptionShort: Read all Bangla Newspapers online or offline within one app! FREE!
